channel.title: Comments on: The British Airways Billboard That Tracks Airplanes Flying Over
channel.description: Web × Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/the-british-airways-billboard-that-tracks-airplanes-flying-over/#comment-707">Emma de la Fosse</a>.
Hey, Emma. Thanks for the heads-up. After doing a little research, I found out that you are actually correct. I'll update that part to that effect. Thanks once again!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Emma de la Fosse.

Hey, Emma. Thanks for the heads-up. After doing a little research, I found out that you are actually correct. I’ll update that part to that effect. Thanks once again!

item.title: By: Emma de la Fosse
item.dc:creator: Emma de la Fosse
item.description: Great article Yusuf. You got all the details correct apart from 1 of them. The idea was created by OgilvyOne, not Ogilvy 12th floor. It was inspired by our Creative Technologist’s daughter pointing at planes flying overhead in the garden.
item.content:encoded: Great article Yusuf. You got all the details correct apart from 1 of them. The idea was created by OgilvyOne, not Ogilvy 12th floor. It was inspired by our Creative Technologist’s daughter pointing at planes flying overhead in the garden.

item.description:

My utmost pleasure. Thanks for reading!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Oluwatosin Afolabi.

My utmost pleasure. Thanks for reading!
